title: K-12 AI Education Learning Task Design: Project-Based Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math operations and data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based integration of AI fundamentals with mathematics curriculum in digital device-enabled practical environments

learning_goals: Students can explain fundamental AI model principles (e.g., classification, clustering) using mathematical concepts.
Learners can implement simple AI models using Python-based block coding tools (e.g., Scratch AI extension).
Learners can collaboratively design and present an AI project that solves real-world problems (e.g., weather forecasting) with team members.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
